main_tasks:
1. Responsible for supporting customer on Android Camera System

2. Responsible for image tuning based on Android Camera System, Image Sensor, 3A, ISP

3. Responsible for supporting customer about technical discussion, issue review, analysis and debugging image quality issue

4. Co-work and discuss with HQ engineer and customer to support project and issue
requirements:
1. BS/MS in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or Electrical Engineering, Image Processing

2. Minimum 2 years of experience in camera ISP/3A tuning development

3. Well knowledge of camera tuning - 3A or ISP(EE/NR/Gamma/CCM.. ETC) -

4. Well knowledge of Camera Technology, Image Processing, SW

5. Familiar with C & C++ language

6. Good verbal and written communication skills in English
jd:
대만의 Fabless 반도체 기업으로 무선 통신기기, 광학 저장기기, HDTV, DVD등에 사용되는 칩셋을 설계·판매하고 있으며Fabless 반도체 기업으로 세계 4위, RFWS 모바일 칩셋 분야에서는 2위의 기술 선도 기업입니다. 1997년에 설립되어 홍콩 stock market에 상장되어 있으며 중국, 싱가폴, 인도, 대한민국, 미국, 일본, 핀란드, 네덜란드, 영국 등 전세계 14개 국가에 30개의 지사를 가지고 있는 글로벌 기업입니다. 

매출: USD 10.9 Billion (2020년, 전세계 기준)
직원수: 17,000+명 (전세계 기준)


주요업무
1. Responsible for supporting customer on Android Camera System

2. Responsible for image tuning based on Android Camera System, Image Sensor, 3A, ISP

3. Responsible for supporting customer about technical discussion, issue review, analysis and debugging image quality issue

4. Co-work and discuss with HQ engineer and customer to support project and issue

자격요건
1. BS/MS in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or Electrical Engineering, Image Processing

2. Minimum 2 years of experience in camera ISP/3A tuning development

3. Well knowledge of camera tuning - 3A or ISP(EE/NR/Gamma/CCM.. ETC) -

4. Well knowledge of Camera Technology, Image Processing, SW

5. Familiar with C & C++ language

6. Good verbal and written communication skills in English

혜택 및 복지
• 가족 경조사 지원 (배우자 포함)
• 패밀리데이 운영
• 결혼, 출산 선물 제공
• 종합병원 건강검진 제공 (연 1회)
• 교육비,통신비,동호회비, 여름휴가비 지원
• 명절, 생일 상품권 지급
